Merge pull request #60 from jasperblues/master

enabledDragging was being ignored when returning to previous state. .
supports resizing of MultiFoldView

Merge pull request #46 from cvanderschuere/fixes

Fixed issue with autoresizing height
Fixed issue with autoresizing

Merge pull request #21 from jklp/master

Calling the appear / disappear methods in the incorrect order

Merge pull request #43 from dnalot/patch-1

Create PaperFold.podspec

Merge pull request #44 from funkyboy/master

Fixed issue #39
Fixed issue #39
Create PaperFold.podspec
merged with master
allow gestures in VoiceOver mode to unfold the left and right view
fixed: rightFoldView not resized properly

when enableHorizontalEdgeDragging is turned on, check that other gestures at the edges are disabled
increased dragging edge width
merge restrictedRectDragging with enabledEdgeDragging branch. will merge them into one method later
resize left/right fold view when paper fold view is resized
hide the fold views initially until they are about to be unfolded
fixed: bottom view unfolds too fast
- exposes divider lines for those that want to hide it.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/honcheng/PaperFold-for-iOS

fixed: crashes when UIGraphicsGetCurrentContext is nil. This happens when it tries to take a screenshot of a UIView with CGRectZero. This no longer crashes, but when rect is zero, there is no view to reveal
fixed: side shadow in the wrong direction

Merge pull request #33 from skedgo/master

Fixes and new features
Description of 'restrictedDraggingRect'
Optional property 'restrictedDraggingRect' to, say, restrict dragging to a navigation bar
Restored by previous work on completion blocks which apparently got lost
Post-merge fix. Re-added auto-hiding of divider lines and added the same for the top and bottom lines.

Merge branch 'upstream'

Conflicts:
	PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFoldView.m
Merge branch 'master' into edge-panning
check if contentView is MKMapView using NSClassFromString to prevent compiler error if user do not use MKMapVIew
added option to drag left/right folds from the edge of the screen, but ignores any horizontal panning gestures in the middle. disabled by default
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/honcheng/PaperFold-for-iOS
updated README
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/lxcid/PaperFold-for-iOS
if the contentView is a map view, take screenshot just before unfolding because the first screenshot is always blank
fixed: right fold view not showing screenshot images when folded
Fold dragging are disabled by default until fold content view are set for the respective direction.
Updated README for documentation on left multifold, and add list of projects/apps that uses PaperFold
changed the name of the 2nd demo project because it doesn't use containment view
fixed compiler warning for duplicated method in header

fixed: unfoldViewToFraction: called 2x
refactored code
successful merge with Łukasz Przytuła's fork
partial merge
Only show the divider line when folding

Disable the gesture recogniser when dragging in both directions is disabled

This is needed to have the content view's regular gesture recognisers not being cancelled, e.g., when using a reorder control.

Merge pull request #28 from skedgo/master

IB support and folding with completion block
Added setPaperFoldState method with completion block
Allow PaperFoldView to be instantiated through InterfaceBuilder
- fixed: if left fold view is a table view, screenshot was always taken from offset 0. This is fixed by taking screenshot of the superview.
- added warning, that disabling centre table view scroll, has a side effect of requiring cell to be tapped twice. To be fixed later
partial commit

Merge branch 'use-leftmultifold-attempt2' into top-multifold

Conflicts:
	PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFoldView.m
Merge branch 'master' into use-leftmultifold-attempt2
- fixed: paperFoldView:didFoldAutomatically:toState not called when view is dragged all the way to final state

Merge branch 'use-leftmultifold-attempt2' into top-multifold

Conflicts:
	PaperFold/PaperFold.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj
	PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFold/MultiFoldView.m
	PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFold/PaperFoldView.h

- left multi-fold works, but pull factor is in the wrong direction
- replaced swipe guide images with glow and shadows to make them more obvious in front of  a background image
- added PaperFoldSwipeHintView as guide views
- add images for swipe hints
Merge branch 'tmp'
- added methods to unfold without animation

Merge pull request #20 from jklp/master

Calling incorrect methods on left / right UIViewController's on state change
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/honcheng/PaperFold-for-iOS
updated README to test github page view tracker
- added option not to use optimized screenshot (retina or non-retina)
Merge branch 'master' into top-multifold
- removed screenshot method that is not used
- updated README
- updated README
- fixed: views in vertical multifold not responding to touch when fully opened
- for top fold view, check scroll view offset, if the super view is a scroll  view
- add shadow for top and bottom view in demo project
- insert rightFoldView at index 0 in contentView to hide the black line

- fixed shadow in vertical fold
- consolidate constants in a single header file
- fixed: black line visible the first time top view loads
- added top multi fold
- added top multi fold, but not working properly
- vertical fold, shares the same class as horizontal fold. removed VerticalFoldView class
- only one fold can be opened at a time
- fixed strange defect on the top right of bottom view
- has bottom vertical flow, there's a defect on the top right
Merge branch 'separate-paperfoldview'
Merge branch 'separate-paperfoldview' of https://github.com/honcheng/PaperFold-for-iOS into separate-paperfoldview
Merge branch 'navigationcontroller'

Merge pull request #10 from alvesjtiago/master

Gitignore, structure, delegates
Example project conform to new structure and delegates. General .gitignore file.

- added PaperFoldNavigationController that can accommodate 3 view controllers
- added sample project that makes use of PaperFoldNavigationController
- added separator line
Merge branch 'separate-paperfoldview'
- updated docs in README

MKMapView screenshot for iOS5.0 and below requires screenshot to be taken at the same scale as the screen. This is not required in the new OS. It is fine to take a non-retina screenshot for a retina display screen
- changed paperFoldView:didTransitionToState:  to paperFoldView:didFoldAutomatically:toState: , indicates if the fold is caused by finger dragging, or calling setPaperFoldState:
- fixed: view offset not sent back in delegate when view is restored

- made methods in PaperFoldViewDelegate optional
- added delegate method paperFoldView:viewDidOffset to send back x offset when view is panned/animated

- fixed: left and right view started with a small gap
- fixed: right view not hidden at startup
- separated PaperFoldView from UIViewController
- updated README - taking screenshot of MKMapVIew in iOS6 is fixed in b4, so it works perfectly with PaperFold now

- added delegate method for paper fold state changes callback
- (void)paperFoldViewController:(id)paperFoldViewController didTransitionToState:(PaperFoldState)paperFoldState

- deprecated unfoldLeftView, unfoldRightView & restoreToCenter. Replaced with setPaperFoldState:
- updated README with new methods
Merge branch 'landscape-support'

- added orientation change support
- added LICENSE file

Merge pull request #7 from eliaskg/master

Fixed EXC_CRASH bug

1) added setEnableLeftFoldDragging and setEnableRightFoldDragging to disable drag. These are enabled by default

2) unfoldLeftView, unfoldRightView, and restoreToCenter methods added
- fixed screenshot placement in README
- added more screenshots
- reduced the GIF dimension in README
- updated with known problem
- fix indentation in README?
- attempt to fix README formatting
updated README with instructions
- use GIF animation in README.md
- added a temporary README
- added licensing
- updated demo project settings
cleaning up
- new provision file
- refactored code to make fold views more customizable
- added light source from the left
multi-fold supports single fold
- added more comments
- use contentView in FoldView as a wrapper view
- removed divider
- rearrange files

- removed container view
- take screenshot for retina display map view (lags)
- fixed: Map not rendered with retina display
- added line

- added left and center table view, with interaction enabled
- increase shadow intensity in folds
- allow left fold view to be touchable
- added separator between left and middle view
- fixed: when dragged to extreme, left and right view restores instead of stay at unfolding

- make view outside the bounds of content view touchable
- show screenshot of view inside right fold
- added fold state callback
- introduce fold state to keep track of animation and gestures
- unfold left/right view automatically when panned past threshold value
- more comments added
- more comments added
- refactored multi-fold view to handle n-number of folds
- cleaned up the code for the left fold view
- first commit, project with working folds for left and right view
